title: ETEKCITY Digital Bathroom Scale, Weight Scale with Large Blue LCD Backlight, High Precision Measurements, 6mm Tempered Glass, 180kg, Silver, 1 Piece (Pack of 1)
descriptions: Reliable measurements in an instant step on the large platform and get accurate measurements in pounds or kilograms. Specifications: 1. Weighs up to 400 lbs. 2. Precisely built with 4 high-precision sensors, delivers results weighing 30g. Accurate resolution neatly displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. 4. TEMPERED STRENGTH: built with a thick and durable 6mm clear tempered glass platform that is sturdy enough to provide years of fitness tracker. Note: 1. Check the scale before use. Do not use the scale if it is damaged. 2. Do not hit or hit the scale and do not use the scale if there is a slight crack on the glass. Due to the nature of the tempered glass, the glass will break if there is a slight crack.
